0cc0bc82-6f7f-4ad5-a355-fe3f2a860e28.description: Kubota Tractor Corporation's PartsPRO badge is awarded to parts professionals who specialize in recommending solutions that address prospective customers’ wants and needs leveraging Kubota’s Parts Equipment portfolio. Recipients have successfully completed a diverse curriculum featuring training that confirms their understanding of Kubota products and customer requirements. This badge is awarded exclusively to KTC and Kubota Dealership

fffd8a59-be21-455f-a79f-31cbfd0e5ccf.description: Kubota Tractor Corporation's Advanced-Level Certified Service Technician badge is awarded to Technicians at Kubota dealerships who demonstrate advanced capabilities in supporting Kubota Utility Vehicles. This badge is awarded exclusively to KTC and Kubota Dealership Personnel.

4f90be27-8c44-45d1-a83e-4b8bc195fdc2.description: Kubota Tractor Corporation's Registered Certified Service Technician badge is awarded to Service Technicians at Kubota dealerships who completes the Registered Level training program. This badge is awarded exclusively to KTC and Kubota Dealership Personnel.
